patthana18.11:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings,)
patthana18.11:0.3_0: There are ten kinds of profit.’
patthana18.11:1.1_0: But causes and reasons don’t cause any condition for the sake of purification of mind.
patthana18.11:2.1_0: But causes and reasons don’t for the sake of investigating, the sake of people, for the sake of causes and reason.
patthana18.11:3.1_0: No cause for the sake of purification by for the sake of causes.
